Package com.hexaware.controller

Interface CrimeAnalysisControllerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CrimeAnalysisController
public interface CrimeAnalysisControllerInterface
Controller interface for Crime Analysis. This interface defines methods for handling user input and interacting with the CrimeAnalysisService. It provides methods for creating incidents, updating incident status, getting incidents within a date range, searching for incidents, generating incident reports, creating cases, and performing case-related operations. All implementing classes should provide the actual implementation of these methods.
Author:
ROHITH

  • Method Details

    • createIncident

      boolean createIncident()
      Method to take input for creating a new incident.
      Returns:
      True if the incident is successfully created; otherwise, false.

      Method to take input for updating the status of an incident.
      Returns:
      True if the incident status is successfully updated; otherwise, false.

      Returns:
      A collection of incidents within the specified date range.

      java.util.Collection<Incident> searchIncidents()
      Method to search for incidents based on various criteria.
      Returns:
      A collection of incidents matching the specified criteria.
